trans-unit.source: Defines properties and methods for all activity designers that have a sequential vertical layout on the workflow design surface.
The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> and classes that inherit from it can contain child activity designers.
Their appearance on the workflow design surface is organized vertically, with child activities displayed on the surface of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> class.

Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> to adjust its UI for users who have disabilities.

If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> to associate with the designer.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow designer surface.
If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> returns `true`, the designer renders an expand-collapse button on the workflow design surface.

If the parent designer of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> returns `false`.

Additionally, if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> is the root designer, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.CanExpandCollapse%2A> returns `false`.
`true` if the designer can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer is expanded on the workflow design surface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> is expanded on the workflow design surface; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.
If the current designer is not the active designer or if the designer is not expanded, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> returns an empty array.
If there are no activity designers in the parent designer, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.GetConnectors%2A> returns an array of one rectangle.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that bounds the connectors.
Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The current object in the navigation order.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order of the .
Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref> read-only collection that contains all of the glyphs to display on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Gets or sets the text to display when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> contains no other activity designers.

The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> property value is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> surface when it contains no child activity designers.
A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface.
Gets the rectangle that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText"></xref> property.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText"></xref> property.
Gets the height and width of the text to display in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> when it contains no child activity designers.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that defines the height and width of the text displayed by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> when it contains no child activity designers.
By default <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpTextSize"></xref> is set to a newly initialized <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
Returns information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified point on the workflow design surface.
The information returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> is based on the point on the workflow design surface that was passed to it.

It includes the activity designer associated with the point, the bounds of that activity designer, the exact hit location of the point, any selectable objects associated with the point, and any user data associated with the point.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> location on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Initialize%2A> assigns a value for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText%2A> property that is displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> if it does not contain any child designers.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
e contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Draws the visual representation of activity at design time.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing arguments.
